sql.data: create temp table TB2 (name TEXT, severity TEXT)

dataview.xpath: /geneos/gateway/directory/probe/managedEntity/sampler[(@name="GW Managed Entity Data")]/dataview[(@name="GW Managed Entity Data")]

sql.data: DELETE FROM TB2; INSERT INTO TB2 SELECT replace(name,'-INF',''), Severity FROM T1 WHERE Severity != "OK" AND Severity != "Undefined" AND name LIKE "%-INF" ORDER BY Severity
select rowid as ID , * from TB2

create temp table TB_FINAL ( MENAME TEXT, D NUM, C NUM, O NUM, Summary NUM, SEVTIME NUM, ATTRIBUTES TEXT); create temp table TB99 ( MENAME TEXT, D NUM, C NUM, O NUM, Summary NUM, SEVTIME NUM, ATTRIBUTES TEXT)

/geneos/gateway/directory/probe/managedEntity/sampler[(@name="GW Managed Entity Data")]/dataview[(@name="GW Managed Entity Data")]

sql.data:
DELETE FROM TB_FINAL; DELETE FROM TB99; INSERT INTO TB99 SELECT name, D, C, O, Sum, SevTime, attributes FROM TB1 WHERE name not like '%Gateway' AND Sum > 1 ; INSERT INTO TB99 SELECT name, D, C, O, Sum, SevTime, attributes FROM TB2 WHERE name not like '%Gateway' AND Sum > 1 ;
INSERT INTO TB99 SELECT name, D, C, O, Sum, SevTime, attributes FROM TB3 WHERE name not like '%Gateway' AND Sum > 1 ; INSERT INTO TB_FINAL SELECT MENAME, D, C, O, Summary, SEVTIME, ATTRIBUTES FROM TB99 order by SEVTIME DESC
select rowid AS ID, * from TB_FINAL
create temp table TB2 ( MENAME TEXT, D NUM, C NUM, O NUM, Summary NUM, SEVTIME NUM, ATTRIBUTES TEXT)

dataview.xpath: /geneos/gateway[(@name="GATEWAY_DASHBOARD")]/directory/probe/managedEntity/sampler[(@name="GW Managed Entity Data")]/dataview[(@name="GW Managed Entity Data")]

sql.data: DELETE FROM TB2; INSERT INTO TB2 SELECT name, D, C, O, Sum, SevTime, attributes FROM TB WHERE Sum > 1 AND name like '%INFRA%' order by SEVTIME DESC
select rowid AS ID, * from TB2
